keyword: how many calories is in a krispy kreme glazed doughnut
title: How Many Calories in a Krispy Kreme Glazed Doughnut?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a Krispy Kreme glazed doughnut—about 190 kcal—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for your diet tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Krispy Kreme Glazed Doughnut?
assumptions: Original Glazed doughnut from Krispy Kreme, standard single serving, fresh from the store.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, size, and exact recipe; check Krispy Kreme's official labels or app for the most current info.

quick_answer.text: A single Krispy Kreme Original Glazed doughnut contains about 190 calories and 11 grams of fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a Krispy Kreme glazed doughnut?
faqs.a: Approximately 190 calories per Original Glazed doughnut.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Krispy Kreme glazed doughnut?
faqs.a: About 22 grams of carbohydrates, including 10 grams of sugars.

faqs.q: Is there protein in Krispy Kreme doughnuts?
faqs.a: Yes, roughly 2 grams of protein per glazed doughnut.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a Krispy Kreme Original Glazed?
faqs.a: Around 11 grams total fat, with 5 grams saturated.

faqs.q: Do Krispy Kreme glazed doughnuts have cholesterol?
faqs.a: Typically 0 mg cholesterol in the Original Glazed variety.
